page.title: Merck Pulls Arthritis Drug from Market
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Merck Co Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MRK.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MRK.N</A> pulled its arthritis drug Vioxx off the market on Thursday after a study showed it doubled the risk of heart attack and stroke. The move sent the company's shares plunging almost 27 percent and erased \$25 billion of its market value.
